title: Cabinet approves scheme to help rural India achieve UN SDGs - Hindustan Times
content: Cabinet approves scheme to help rural India achieve UN SDGs  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: The scheme worth â‚¹5,911 crore is aimed at empowering 2,78,000 Panchayati Raj institutions, or elected rural local governments, to implement a set of social goals which the UN has deemed necessary for sustainable development.
